What do you get with this verification?
The ability to set up a more secure two-step login.
Verification needs to be done from the phone number from the country you specified in your profile.

Come in and enjoy the world of Amateurs.
Your profile has been created, but please note that it is not yet active.
To complete your registration, just click on the link we sent to %s.

If you didn\'t get the email, please try looking in your spam folder or hang on for a few minutes.\n\nIf that doesn\'t work either, or if you have any other problem activating your account, please email us and we\'ll sort it out.
Get more trustworthy verified profile right now
Write your nick, current date, name amateri.com on the paper and take a photo with it. If you are using the profile as a pair, we need a verification photo from you both.
New picture has been sent. Verification photo will be checked by administrator. Thank you.
You can Top the ad to the 1st place right now.
Using the Top feature makes the dating ad more visible and it will maintain a top position in its category for %d days.
Repeated use of the Top feature adds up the days, dating ads with more cumulated days will gain higher position in the list.
The price of one single message received is %s including VAT.
